017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
020import java.lang.constant.Constable;
021import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
024import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
025import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
026
027import java.util.Arrays;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.HashSet;
030import java.util.Iterator;
031import java.util.Map;
032import java.util.Map.Entry;
033import java.util.Optional;
034import java.util.Set;
035import java.util.SortedMap;
036import java.util.StringJoiner;
037import java.util.TreeMap;
038
039import java.util.function.Predicate;
040
041import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
042import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
043
044import static java.util.Collections.emptySortedMap;
045import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSortedMap;
046
047import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Constable;
048import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifiers;
049
050/**
051 * A {@link Constable}, immutable set of 
052 * key-value pairs that can be used to further qualify an object for
053 * many different purposes.
054 *
055 * <p>This is a <a
056 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based
057 * class</a>.</p>
058 *
059 * <p>Values of type {@code V} must be members of classes adhering to
060 * <a
061 * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/doc-files/ValueBased.html">value-based
062 * semantics</a>.</p>
063 *
064 * <p>Undefined behavior will result if the preceding requirements are
065 * not honored by callers.</p>
066 *
067 * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in this
068 * {@link Qualifiers}
069 *
070 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
071 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
072 *
073 * @see #of(String, Constable)
074 */
075public final class Qualifiers<V extends Constable> implements Constable {
076
077
078  /*
079   * Static fields.
080   */
081
082
083  private static final Qualifiers<?> EMPTY_QUALIFIERS = new Qualifiers<>();
084
085
086  /*
087   * Instance fields.
088   */
089
090
091  private final SortedMap<String, V> qualifiers;
092
093
094  /*
095   * Constructors.
096   */
097
098
099  private Qualifiers() {
100    this(null);
101  }
102
103  private Qualifiers(final Map<? extends String, ? extends V> qualifiers) {
104    super();
105    if (qualifiers == null || qualifiers.isEmpty()) {
106      this.qualifiers = emptySortedMap();
107    } else {
108      this.qualifiers = unmodifiableSortedMap(new TreeMap<>(qualifiers));
109    }
110  }
111
112
113  /*
114   * Instance methods.
115   */
116
117
118  /**
119   * Returns an immutable {@link SortedMap} of the qualifiers in this
120   * {@link Qualifiers}.
121   *
122   * @return an immutable {@link SortedMap} of the qualifiers in this
123   * {@link Qualifiers}
124   *
125   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
126   *
127   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
128   *
129   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
130   * threads.
131   */
132  public final SortedMap<String, V> qualifiers() {
133    return this.qualifiers;
134  }
135
136  /**
137   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Qualifiers} logically
138   * contains the supplied {@link Qualifiers}.
139   *
140   * <p>A {@link Qualifiers} is said to contain another {@link
141   * Qualifiers} if either:</p>
142   *
143   * <ul>
144   *
145   * <li>the two {@link Qualifiers} instances are identical, or</li>
146   *
147   * <li>the {@linkplain #size() size} of the first {@link Qualifiers}
148   * is greater than the {@linkplain #size() size} of the second
149   * {@link Qualifiers}, and the {@linkplain #entrySet() entry set} of
150   * this {@link Qualifiers} {@linkplain
151   * Set#containsAll(java.util.Collection) contains all} of the
152   * entries in the second {@link Qualifiers}' {@linkplain #entrySet()
153   * entry set}</li>
154   *
155   * </ul>
156   *
157   * @param other the {@link Qualifiers} to test; must not be {@code
158   * null}
159   *
160   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Qualifiers} logically
161   * contains the supplied {@link Qualifiers}
162   *
163   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
164   *
165   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
166   *
167   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
168   * threads.
169   *
170   * @see #size()
171   *
172   * @see #entrySet()
173   *
174   * @see Set#containsAll(java.util.Collection)
175   */
176  public final boolean contains(final Qualifiers<?> other) {
177    return this == other || this.size() >= other.size() && this.entrySet().containsAll(other.entrySet());
178  }
179
180  /**
181   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Qualifiers} has no entries.
182   *
183   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Qualifiers} has no entries
184   *
185   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
186   *
187   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
188   * threads.
189   *
190   * @see #qualifiers()
191   *
192   * @see Map#isEmpty()
193   */
194  public final boolean isEmpty() {
195    return this.qualifiers().isEmpty();
196  }
197
198  /**
199   * Returns the number of entries in this {@link Qualifiers}.
200   *
201   * <p>The number returned is always {@code 0} or greater.</p>
202   *
203   * @return the number of entries in this {@link Qualifiers}
204   *
205   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
206   *
207   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
208   * threads.
209   *
210   * @see #qualifiers()
211   *
212   * @see Map#size()
213   */
214  public final int size() {
215    return this.qualifiers().size();
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Returns a non-{@code null}, immutable {@link Set} of immutable
220   * {@link Entry} instances representing individual qualifier
221   * entries.
222   *
223   * @return a non-{@code null} immutable {@link Set} of immuable
224   * {@link Entry} instances representing individual qualifier entries
225   *
226   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
227   *
228   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
229   *
230   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
231   * threads.
232   *
233   * @see #qualifiers()
234   *
235   * @see SortedMap#entrySet()
236   */
237  public final Set<Entry<String, V>> entrySet() {
238    return this.qualifiers().entrySet();
239  }
240
241  /**
242   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Qualifiers} is a
243   * subset of the supplied {@link Qualifiers}.
244   *
245   * @param other the other {@link Qualifiers}; must not be {@code
246   * null}
247   *
248   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Qualifiers} is a
249   * subset of the supplied {@link Qualifiers}
250   *
251   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
252   *
253   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
254   *
255   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
256   * threads.
257   */
258  public final boolean isSubsetOf(final Qualifiers<?> other) {
259    return other == this || other.contains(this);
260  }
261
262  /**
263   * Returns the number of entries this {@link Qualifiers} has in
264   * common with the supplied {@link Qualifiers}.
265   *
266   * <p>The number returned will be {@code 0} or greater.</p>
267   *
268   * @param other the other {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null} in
269   * which case {@code 0} will be returned
270   *
271   * @return the number of entries this {@link Qualifiers} has in
272   * common with the supplied {@link Qualifiers}
273   *
274   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
275   *
276   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
277   * threads.
278   */
279  public final int intersectionSize(final Qualifiers<?> other) {
280    if (other == this) {
281      // Just an identity check to rule this easy case out.
282      return this.size();
283    } else if (other == null || other.qualifiers.isEmpty()) {
284      return 0;
285    } else {
286      final Collection<? extends Entry<?, ?>> otherEntrySet = other.qualifiers.entrySet();
287      return (int)this.entrySet()
288        .stream()
289        .filter(otherEntrySet::contains)
290        .count();
291    }
292  }
293
294  /**
295   * Returns the size of the <em>symmetric difference</em> between
296   * this {@link Qualifiers} and the supplied {@link Qualifiers}.
297   *
298   * <p>The number returned is always {@code 0} or greater.</p>
299   *
300   * <p>The size of the symmetric difference between two {@link
301   * Qualifiers} instances is the number of qualifier entries that are
302   * in one {@link Qualifiers} instance but not in the other.</p>
303   *
304   * @param other the other {@link Qualifiers} instance; may be {@code
305   * null} in which case the return value of an invocation of this
306   * {@link Qualifiers}' {@link #size()} method will be returned
307   *
308   * @return the size of the <em>symmetric difference</em> between
309   * this {@link Qualifiers} and the supplied {@link Qualifiers};
310   * always {@code 0} or greater
311   *
312   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
313   *
314   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
315   * threads.
316   */
317  public final int symmetricDifferenceSize(final Qualifiers<?> other) {
318    if (other == this) {
319      // Just an identity check to rule this easy case out.
320      return 0;
321    } else if (other == null || other.qualifiers.isEmpty()) {
322      return this.size();
323    } else if (this.equals(other)) {
324      return 0;
325    } else {
326      final Collection<Entry<?, ?>> otherSymmetricDifference = new HashSet<>(this.entrySet());
327      other.qualifiers.entrySet().stream()
328        .filter(Predicate.not(otherSymmetricDifference::add))
329        .forEach(otherSymmetricDifference::remove);
330      return otherSymmetricDifference.size();
331    }
332  }
333
334  /**
335   * Returns an {@link Optional} containing a {@link ConstantDesc}
336   * representing this {@link Qualifiers}.
337   *
338   * @return an {@link Optional} containing a {@link ConstantDesc}
339   * representing this {@link Qualifiers}; never {@code null}; never
340   * {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty}
341   *
342   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
343   *
344   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
345   *
346   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
347   * threads.
348   */
349  @Override // Constable
350  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
351    final Collection<Entry<String, V>> entrySet = this.entrySet();
352    if (entrySet.isEmpty()) {
353      return
354        Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
355                                           MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC,
356                                                                     CD_Qualifiers,
357                                                                     "of",
358                                                                     MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Qualifiers))));
359    } else {
360      final int bsmInvokeArgumentsLength = 2 * entrySet.size() + 1;
361      final ConstantDesc[] bsmInvokeArguments = new ConstantDesc[bsmInvokeArgumentsLength];
362      bsmInvokeArguments[0] =
363        MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.STATIC,
364                                  CD_Qualifiers,
365                                  "of",
366                                  MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Qualifiers,
367                                                    CD_Constable.arrayType()));
368      int i = 1;
369      for (final Entry<String, V> entry : entrySet) {
370        bsmInvokeArguments[i++] = entry.getKey();
371        final Constable value = entry.getValue();
372        final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> v = value == null ? Optional.of(NULL) : value.describeConstable();
373        if (v.isEmpty()) {
374          return Optional.empty();
375        }
376        bsmInvokeArguments[i++] = v.orElseThrow();
377      }
378      return Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE, bsmInvokeArguments));
379    }
380  }
381
382  /**
383   * Returns a hashcode for this {@link Qualifiers}.
384   *
385   * @return a hashcode for this {@link Qualifiers}
386   *
387   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
388   *
389   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
390   * threads.
391   *
392   * @see #qualifiers()
393   *
394   * @see Map#hashCode()
395   */
396  @Override // Object
397  public final int hashCode() {
398    return this.qualifiers().hashCode();
399  }
400
401  /**
402   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Qualifiers} is equal to the
403   * supplied {@link Object}.
404   *
405   * <p>This {@link Qualifiers} is equal to the supplied {@link
406   * Object} if and only if all of the following conditions hold:</p>
407   *
408   * <ul>
409   *
410   * <li>the supplied {@link Object} is non-{@code null} and returns
411   * {@link Qualifiers Qualifiers.class} from its {@link
412   * Object#getClass()} method</li>
413   *
414   * <li>The return value of an invocation of the {@link
415   * #qualifiers()} method on this {@link Qualifiers} instance is
416   * {@linkplain Map#equals(Object) equal to} the return value of an
417   * invocation of the {@link #qualifiers()} method on the other
418   * {@link Qualifiers} instance</li>
419   *
420   * </ul>
421   *
422   * @param other the {@link Object} to test; may be {@code null} in
423   * which case {@code false} will be returned
424   *
425   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Qualifiers} is equal to the
426   * supplied {@link Object}
427   *
428   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
429   *
430   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
431   * threads.
432   *
433   * @see Map#equals(Object)
434   */
435  @Override // Object
436  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
437    if (other == this) {
438      return true;
439    } else if (other == null || this.getClass() != other.getClass()) {
440      return false;
441    } else {
442      return this.qualifiers().equals(((Qualifiers)other).qualifiers());
443    }
444  }
445
446  /**
447   * Returns a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
448   * {@link Qualifiers}.
449   *
450   * <p>The format of the returned {@link String} is deliberately
451   * unspecified.</p>
452   *
453   * @return a non-{@code null} {@link String} representation of this
454   * {@link Qualifiers}
455   *
456   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
457   *
458   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
459   *
460   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
461   * threads.
462   */
463  @Override // Object
464  public final String toString() {
465    final StringJoiner sj = new StringJoiner(";");
466    for (final Entry<?, ?> entry : this.entrySet()) {
467      sj.add(entry.getKey() + "=" + entry.getValue());
468    }
469    return sj.toString();
470  }
471
472
473  /*
474   * Static methods.
475   */
476
477
478  /**
479   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} whose {@link #size()} method returns
480   * {@code 0} (and whose {@link #isEmpty()} method returns {@code
481   * true}).
482   *
483   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
484   * returned {@link Qualifiers} (somewhat moot since the returned
485   * {@link Qualifiers} will be {@linkplain #isEmpty() empty})
486   *
487   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} whose {@link #size()} method returns
488   * {@code 0} (and whose {@link #isEmpty()} method returns {@code
489   * true})
490   *
491   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
492   *
493   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
494   *
495   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
496   * threads.
497   */
498  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
499  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of() {
500    return (Qualifiers<V>)EMPTY_QUALIFIERS;
501  }
502
503  /**
504   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} equal to one consisting of the
505   * entries represented by the supplied {@link Map}.
506   *
507   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
508   * returned {@link Qualifiers}
509   *
510   * @param map the {@link Map} of qualifier names and values; may be
511   * {@code null} in which case the return value of the {@link #of()}
512   * method will be returned
513   *
514   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} equal to one consisting of the
515   * entries represented by the supplied {@link Map}
516   *
517   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
518   *
519   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
520   *
521   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
522   * threads.
523   *
524   * @see #of(String, Constable)
525   */
526  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of(final Map<? extends String, ? extends V> map) {
527    if (map == null || map.isEmpty()) {
528      return of();
529    } else {
530      final SortedMap<String, V> newMap = new TreeMap<>();
531      map.entrySet().forEach(e -> newMap.put(e.getKey(), e.getValue()));
532      return new Qualifiers<>(newMap);
533    }
534  }
535
536  /**
537   * Returns a new {@link Qualifiers} with a single qualifier whose
538   * name is {@code value} and whose value is the supplied {@code
539   * value0} argument.
540   *
541   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
542   * returned {@link Qualifiers}
543   *
544   * @param value0 the new value; must not be {@code null}
545   *
546   * @return a new {@link Qualifiers} with a single qualifier whose
547   * name is {@code value} and whose value is the supplied {@code
548   * value0} argument
549   *
550   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code value0} is {@code null}
551   *
552   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
553   *
554   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
555   *
556   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
557   * threads.
558   *
559   * @see #of(String, Constable)
560   */
561  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of(final V value0) {
562    return of("value", value0);
563  }
564
565  /**
566   * Returns a new {@link Qualifiers} with a single qualifier whose
567   * name is the supplied {@code name0} argument, and whose value is
568   * the supplied {@code value0} argument.
569   *
570   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
571   * returned {@link Qualifiers}
572   *
573   * @param name0 the qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
574   *
575   * @param value0 the new value; must not be {@code null}
576   *
577   * @return a new {@link Qualifiers} with a single qualifier whose
578   * name is the supplied {@code name0} argument, and whose value is
579   * the supplied {@code value0} argument
580   *
581   * @exception NullPointerException if either {@code name0} or {@code
582   * value0} is {@code null}
583   *
584   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
585   *
586   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
587   *
588   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
589   * threads.
590   */
591  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of(final String name0, final V value0) {
592    return new Qualifiers<>(Map.of(name0, value0));
593  }
594
595  /**
596   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} consisting of the entries
597   * represented by the supplied alternating name-value pairs.
598   *
599   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
600   * returned {@link Qualifiers}
601   *
602   * @param name0 a qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
603   *
604   * @param value0 the qualifier value corresponding to the
605   * immediately preceding qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
606   *
607   * @param name1 a qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
608   *
609   * @param value1 the qualifier value corresponding to the
610   * immediately preceding qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
611   *
612   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} consisting of the entries
613   * represented by the supplied alternating name-value pairs
614   *
615   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
616   *
617   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
618   *
619   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
620   * threads.
621   */
622  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of(final String name0, final V value0,
623                                                             final String name1, final V value1) {
624    final SortedMap<String, V> map = new TreeMap<>();
625    map.put(name0, value0);
626    map.put(name1, value1);
627    return new Qualifiers<>(map);
628  }
629
630  /**
631   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} consisting of the entries
632   * represented by the supplied alternating name-value pairs.
633   *
634   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
635   * returned {@link Qualifiers}
636   *
637   * @param name0 a qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
638   *
639   * @param value0 the qualifier value corresponding to the
640   * immediately preceding qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
641   *
642   * @param name1 a qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
643   *
644   * @param value1 the qualifier value corresponding to the
645   * immediately preceding qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
646   *
647   * @param name2 a qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
648   *
649   * @param value2 the qualifier value corresponding to the
650   * immediately preceding qualifier name; must not be {@code null}
651   *
652   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} consisting of the entries
653   * represented by the supplied alternating name-value pairs
654   *
655   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
656   *
657   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
658   *
659   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
660   * threads.
661   */
662  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of(final String name0, final V value0,
663                                                             final String name1, final V value1,
664                                                             final String name2, final V value2) {
665    final SortedMap<String, V> map = new TreeMap<>();
666    map.put(name0, value0);
667    map.put(name1, value1);
668    map.put(name2, value2);
669    return new Qualifiers<>(map);
670  }
671
672  /**
673   * Returns a {@link Qualifiers} consisting of the entries
674   * represented by the supplied alternating name-value pairs.
675   *
676   * <p>The supplied {@code nameValuePairs} must be an even-numbered
677   * array of non-{@code null} {@link Constable} instances, where the
678   * zero-based even-numbered elements are {@link String}s represents
679   * qualifier names, and the zero-based odd-numbered {@link
680   * Constable} elements represent qualifier values.</p>
681   *
682   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the qualifiers in the
683   * returned {@link Qualifiers}
684   * 
685   * @param nameValuePairs the name-value pairs as described above;
686   * may be {@code null} in which case the return value of the {@link
687   * #of()} method will be returned
688   *
689   * @return a {@link Qualifiers} consisting of the entries
690   * represented by the supplied alternating name-value pairs
691   *
692   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if an even number of
693   * arguments is not supplied
694   *
695   * @exception ClassCastException if elements in the supplied array
696   * at positions {@code 0}, {@code 2}, {@code 4}… are not {@link
697   * String}s
698   *
699   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
700   *
701   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
702   *
703   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
704   * threads.
705   */
706  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
707  public static final <V extends Constable> Qualifiers<V> of(final Constable... nameValuePairs) {
708    if (nameValuePairs == null || nameValuePairs.length <= 0) {
709      return Qualifiers.of();
710    } else if (nameValuePairs.length % 2 != 0) {
711      throw new IllegalArgumentException("nameValuePairs: " + Arrays.toString(nameValuePairs));
712    } else {
713      final SortedMap<String, V> map = new TreeMap<>();
714      for (int i = 0; i < nameValuePairs.length; i++) {
715        map.put((String)nameValuePairs[i++], (V)nameValuePairs[i]);
716      }
717      return new Qualifiers<>(map);
718    }
719  }
720
721}
